definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to a despot or tyrant .
examples: This despotic age of the empire ended in a revolt.

definitions.definition: Acting or ruling as a despot, tyrannical .
examples: The despotic king dissolved the parliament, and took personal control of the country.

main_definition: Of or pertaining to a despot or tyrant .
secondary_definitions: Acting or ruling as a despot, tyrannical .
